bwwExcerpt: In the movie mogul's first foray as the lead producer of a Broadway sho...Weinstein has chosen the route of "giving people what they expect"...Something, in other words, big and flashy...The flash doesn't drown out the other aspects of the production. The acting is fine -- the children in particular avoid the normal pitfalls of child acting...The musical has funny moments and moving moments. The score mostly offers a sweet, bouncy British pop sound...There is nothing here outright to hate, and t
